name: Enhanceomancer
description:
Play as Astraea, a runemage errant, tasked with shutting down portals to a dangerous other realm, in this topdown shooter where you choose how you get stronger - and how the enemies get stronger as well! See how high a score you can get!

Controls:

wasd to: move

left click:  shoot

right click: dash

You can pause with escape. I didn't have time for an options screen or... a lot, with only three or so days despite the jam's weeklong time.

my current high score if anyone cares to try to compete  (Round 38,  Score 507,695)

Known Issues:

Score doesn't reset when restarting... (if you're gonna compare score, probably reload the game first :D)

Some projectiles just go missing... 

Enemies will sometimes get stuck in strange places 

Probably too much screen flash

Credits:

Topdown set and icons from cainos

Font was hope gold from somepx

The (imo amazing) music is from Sidearm Studios, used some side effects from them as well as Imphezia, did some amount of editing on most of those.

Some LPC art from opengameart, credits are here.

Ansimuz's warped shooting fx.
